name: Kaczka
description: Kaczka is a puzzle game based on Polish TV show titled Czy wydra wygra. The goal of the player is arrangement an image divided into 12 puzzles from constantly moving in the bottom panel elements. The left mouse button stops moving elements, the player must decide within just 1 second where is the right spot of selected puzzle. Wrong choice hides the element, good one leaves it on the board. The player has 210 second for completing the task, including familiarizing with laid out a picture. The game features 25 pictures all together with a quality of 16 colors game. New pictures may be added to game catalogue.
